divs: Sighting DetailsWhile playing scrabble on our west-facing back porch, noticed a large bright orange light moving rather slowly from north-northwest towards the south-southeast. Object made no sound. Object appeared to turn right towards the southwest, out over the Gulf of Mexico. Brightness of object did not change as the turn was made. Brightness of the object diminished as it appeared to move away. Object was witnessed for approximately 4 minutes. Was witnessed by three others and all commented on the unusual nature of the incident. After thinking about the incident for an hour, I called and reported the incident to Pinellas County Sheriff in Dunedin, Fl. Inquired if any other calls had been placed about the incident, and was informed that they had received no other calls.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Palm Harbor
There were no other sightings in Palm Harbor on or around November 20th 2010
Summary: (sg) VERY UNUSUAL light in the sky, and it is moving.
